title: JWT-Based OTP Authentication System
description: Comprehensive guide to implementing secure JWT-based OTP authentication for user registration and password reset workflows. Learn industry best practices for token management and security.

title: Building Scalable React Applications
description: Master the art of building scalable React applications with proper state management, code splitting, lazy loading, and performance optimization techniques for enterprise-level projects.

title: Modern CSS Techniques and Patterns
description: Explore cutting-edge CSS techniques including Grid, Flexbox, Container Queries, and CSS custom properties to create beautiful, responsive, and maintainable user interfaces.

title: TypeScript Best Practices 2025
description: Discover essential TypeScript patterns, advanced types, generics, and best practices to write more maintainable, type-safe, and scalable code in modern applications.

title: RESTful API Design Principles
description: Learn how to design robust, scalable, and maintainable RESTful APIs following industry standards, best practices, and modern architectural patterns for production systems.

title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
description: Master the core principles of user interface and user experience design including color theory, typography, spacing, and accessibility to create intuitive digital products.

title: Advanced React Hooks Patterns
description: Deep dive into advanced React Hooks patterns including custom hooks, useReducer for complex state, useMemo optimization, and building reusable hook libraries.

title: Database Optimization Techniques
description: Learn professional database optimization strategies including indexing, query optimization, caching, connection pooling, and performance monitoring for high-traffic applications.

title: Microservices Architecture Guide
description: Comprehensive guide to designing and implementing microservices architecture with service discovery, API gateways, event-driven communication, and container orchestration.

title: Web Performance Optimization
description: Master web performance optimization with code splitting, lazy loading, image optimization, caching strategies, and monitoring tools to achieve blazing-fast load times.
